name: Znail Codespace (Stable Image)
postStartCommand: docker rm -f znail >/dev/null 2>&1 || true && docker run -d --name znail-dockerized -p 5000:5000 --restart unless-stopped ghcr.io/theelephantcoder/znail-docker:v0.1.0-beta || docker run -d --name znail-docker -p 5000:5000 --restart unless-stopped ghcr.io/theelephantcoder/znail-docker:latest
